title: Douglass on Fourth of July - Context

content.question: The excerpt most directly reflects the

choices.label: efforts to commemorate African American contributions to the American Revolution
public visibility of African Americans in abolitionist campaigns
migration of many African Americans from the rural South to the urban North
willingness of the abolitionist movement to use violence to free African Americans

content.answer: public visibility of African Americans in abolitionist campaigns

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
